Aries: 4th House in Aries — Fiery childhood. Loud kitchen. Home = independence.
Taurus: 4th House in Taurus — Cozy nooks, good food, strong roots. Earthy heritage.
Gemini: 4th House in Gemini — Lots of moves, siblings, or stories. Home is never boring.
Cancer: 4th House in Cancer — Classic ancestral vibes. Emotional memory palace.
Leo: 4th House in Leo — Theatrical family. Dramatic dinners. Royal ancestry?
Virgo: 4th House in Virgo — Organized chaos. Schedules on the fridge.
Libra: 4th House in Libra — Aesthetic home. Parents dressed like models.
Scorpio: 4th House in Scorpio — Deep bonds, secrets, ancestral wounds.
Sagittarius: 4th House in Sagittarius — International roots. Maps on the walls.
Capricorn: 4th House in Capricorn — Strict upbringing. Legacy is serious.
Aquarius: 4th House in Aquarius — Unconventional family. Bohemian house.
Pisces: 4th House in Pisces — Dreamy, mystical home. Lots of music and incense.
